name: Slots of Poker at Aces Casino
summary: Enjoy Las Vegas casino slots and poker action with Slots of Poker! 15 different casino slot machines to play including Gladiators, Aliens, Cats, Treasure Hunt, Dogs and more. You start with 25,000 FREE coins and win more with free bonus spins and level up rewards. Plenty of big wins, free spins. Just take a seat in the casino and spin, spin, spin while you win, win, win!
